# ui-tabs



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                           | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `selectedTab` | `selected-tab` | Specifies the identifier for the initial selected tab | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `vertical`    | `vertical`     | Specifies if tab list is displayed vertically         | `boolean` | `false`     |
